ej,cirij001,P,gibsg901,Call at 1B (Threw helmet) $Jeff Cirillo dove into 1B and was ruled safe; the umpires then called him out for running about five feet outside the baseline; Cirillo threw his helmet onto the field as he stomped off to the bench; he was ejected by HP umpire Greg Gibson and then came back onto the field to argue with Gibson; manager Bob Melvin and SS Carlos Guillen restrained Cirillo
Protest=H

$1B umpire Greg Gibson ruled that the ball had struck Eric Byrnes' foot and was foul; Mariners manager Bob Melvin asked about the call so the umpires huddled and reversed the call to a fair ball and that Byrnes was out; Athletics manager Ken Macha protested the game
ej,sciom001,M,fostm901,Balls and strikes Angels Manager Mike Scioscia ejected by HP umpire Marty Foster
$Jose Molina called for interference for running into his own bunt
Athletics Jermaine Dye left the game due to an injured neck/shoulder

ej,bradm001,P,froeb901,Called third strike Indians Milton Bradley ejected by HP umpire Bruce Froemming after throwing his bat and helmet towards the umpire after his strikeout; Bradley said that Froemming 'took the bat out of my hands so I was giving it to him'
ej,nixot001,P,iassd901,Called third strike ej,littg801,M,iassd901,Called third strike Red Sox Trot Nixon and Manager Grady Little ejected by HP umpire Dan Iassogna

ej,mclaj801,C,brinj901,Check swing ej,elial101,C,cousd901,Check swing $no swing was called on Ramon Hernandez for ball four and the Devil Rays bench erupted; Coach John McLaren and Coach Lee Elia ejected by 1B umpire Joe Brinkman; a tray of gum and candy was thrown onto the field

ej,gonzj003,P,brinj901,Check swing (threw food onto field) $Devil Rays pitcher Jeremi Gonzalez ejected by 1B umpire Joe Brinkman when Gonzalez went into the digout, he threw a bucket of sunflower seeds onto the field and was ejected; he was still upset about the check swing call in the fifth inning
